content: {"locationId": "4971", "organizationId": "4183", "name": "Heard County Food Pantry", "address1": "1191 Franklin Pkwy", "address2": "", "city": "Franklin", "state": "GA", "zipCode": "30217", "country": null, "phone": "706-675-5344", "phoneExt": "", "website": "", "latitude": "33.27117", "longitude": "-85.09307", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "COUNTY:  Heard", "languages": "English", "features": "", "aboutUs": "Hello Neighbor! We are pleased to serve you each week on Friday from 8:30 a.m. to 12:00 p.m. We operate a drive-through distribution located on the back side of the Outpost Family Resource Center located at 1191 Franklin Parkway, Franklin, GA. Please be prepared to show your ID and, on your first visit, proof of Heard County residency. ", "notes": "As school starts back, we will resume our weekly backpack meals program at the following schools: Heard County Elementary, Ephesus Elementary, Centralhatchee Elementary, and Heard County Middle. If you would like for your child to receive a bag each week, please contact your school's counselor or principal. ALL Heard County High School students are able to shop Arrow Foods, the free grocery store located in the school. Contact HCHS office for more information. ", "contactName": "", "contactPhone": "706-675-5344", "contactEmail": "", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "CSFP Program, Curbside Pickup / Drive Through, Lifting / Carrying Assistance, Outdoor Service, Pre-Packed Boxes / Bags, TEFAP Program", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "Fruits & Vegetables, Meat, Shelf Stable/Non-Perishable Goods", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 42, "regionName": "Atlanta Community Food Bank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "17b4255f-0222-445e-984f-653525137fd3.png", "website": "https://www.acfb.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Eastern Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "ET", "offsetHours": "-4", "schedules": ["Friday 8:00 AM-12:00 PM"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
